    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elven Weapon Elegance](/Feats.aspx?ID=20) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 41 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Elven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

You are attuned to the weapons of your elven ancestors and are particularly deadly when using them. Whenever you critically hit using an [elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) weapon or one of the weapons listed in [Elven Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=14), you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.
name: Elven Weapon Elegance
